name: Trash Fishing
description:
Made For The #SEAJAM Hosted by PolyMars

Play as a lone Fisher man fishing trash out the water to lower the pollution, while Try to avoid catching the fish.

Control :

Left Arrow : Move Left

Right Arrow : Move Right

Space : Release The Hook

Game Rule :

Catching trash will add the Score and lower the pollution, meanwhile Catching fish  will decrease the Score and increase the pollution.

Fish And Trash:

Trash :

- paper : add 100 score and Lower pollution by 1

- Bottle : add 200 score and Lower pollution by 3

- Mysterious Barrel : add 500 score and Lower pollution by 10

Fish :

- Small Orange Fish : subtract 50 Score and Add pollution by 1

- Medium Green Fish : subtract 100 Score and Add pollution by 2

- Shark : subtract 250 Score and Add pollution by 5
